languages.text: "Нет, нет, что вы! Никаких больше мужей и жен! Я слишком стара для подобного. Все, чего я хочу — лишь наслаждаться последними годами жизни".

traits.locale_text: "Нет, нет, что вы! Никаких больше мужей и жен! Я слишком стара для подобного. Все, чего я хочу — лишь наслаждаться последними годами жизни".
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

languages.text: "No, no, no! Why ever would you— no more husbands or wives! I am too old for all of that. All I want is to enjoy the last years of my life."
languages.original_text: "Нет, нет, что вы! Никаких больше мужей и жен! Я слишком стара для подобного. Все, чего я хочу — лишь наслаждаться последними годами жизни".

traits.locale_text: "No, no, no! Why ever would you— no more husbands or wives! I am too old for all of that. All I want is to enjoy the last years of my life."
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

traits.locale_text: "No, no, no! Why ever would you— no more husbands or wives! I am too old for all of that. All I want is to enjoy the last years of my life."
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

traits.locale_text: "No, no, no! Why ever would you— no more husbands or wives! I am too old for all of that. All I want is to enjoy the last years of my life."
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

traits.locale_text: "No, no, no! Why ever would you— no more husbands or wives! I am too old for all of that. All I want is to enjoy the last years of my life."
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

languages.text: “不，不，不！您为什么会这么想——无论是男是女，都算了吧！我太老了，不适合再做这些事情了。我只想好好享受最后几年的时光。”
languages.original_text: "No, no, no! Why ever would you— no more husbands or wives! I am too old for all of that. All I want is to enjoy the last years of my life."

traits.locale_text: “不，不，不！您为什么会这么想——无论是男是女，都算了吧！我太老了，不适合再做这些事情了。我只想好好享受最后几年的时光。”
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

languages.text: «¡No, no, no! ¿Por qué se le ocurriría...? ¡No quiero ni maridos ni esposas! Soy muy vieja para eso. Ya solo quiero disfrutar de los últimos años que me quedan».
languages.original_text: "No, no, no! Why ever would you— no more husbands or wives! I am too old for all of that. All I want is to enjoy the last years of my life."

traits.locale_text: «¡No, no, no! ¿Por qué se le ocurriría...? ¡No quiero ni maridos ni esposas! Soy muy vieja para eso. Ya solo quiero disfrutar de los últimos años que me quedan».
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

languages.text: 「いえいえ、ダメです！どうして…夫も妻もいりません！結婚するには年を取り過ぎています。ただ、余生を楽しく過ごせればいいのです。
languages.original_text: "No, no, no! Why ever would you— no more husbands or wives! I am too old for all of that. All I want is to enjoy the last years of my life."

traits.locale_text: 「いえいえ、ダメです！どうして…夫も妻もいりません！結婚するには年を取り過ぎています。ただ、余生を楽しく過ごせればいいのです。
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

languages.text: « Ah non, certainement pas ! Pourquoi diable... Je ne veux plus jamais entendre parler d'épousailles ! J'ai passé l'âge. Tout ce que je veux, c'est profiter tranquillement des dernières années qu'il me reste à vivre. »
languages.original_text: "No, no, no! Why ever would you— no more husbands or wives! I am too old for all of that. All I want is to enjoy the last years of my life."

traits.locale_text: « Ah non, certainement pas ! Pourquoi diable... Je ne veux plus jamais entendre parler d'épousailles ! J'ai passé l'âge. Tout ce que je veux, c'est profiter tranquillement des dernières années qu'il me reste à vivre. »
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

languages.text: "Nein, nein, nein! Warum solltet Ihr ...? Keine Gatten und Gattinnen mehr! Ich bin zu alt für das alles. Ich möchte nur die letzten Jahre meines Lebens genießen."
languages.original_text: "No, no, no! Why ever would you— no more husbands or wives! I am too old for all of that. All I want is to enjoy the last years of my life."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, nein, nein! Warum solltet Ihr ...? Keine Gatten und Gattinnen mehr! Ich bin zu alt für das alles. Ich möchte nur die letzten Jahre meines Lebens genießen."
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

languages.text: "Hayır, hayır! Neden böyle bir şey... Artık koca da istemiyorum, karı da! O işler için çok yaşladım. Ömrümün son yıllarının tadını çıkarmak istiyorum sadece."
languages.original_text: "No, no, no! Why ever would you— no more husbands or wives! I am too old for all of that. All I want is to enjoy the last years of my life."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır, hayır! Neden böyle bir şey... Artık koca da istemiyorum, karı da! O işler için çok yaşladım. Ömrümün son yıllarının tadını çıkarmak istiyorum sadece."
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady
